description.value:
Weapon (Vibroblade)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with this enhanced weapon.

This weapon has 6 charges and regains [[/r 1d6]] charges when you complete a long rest. Once per turn when you hit with a melee weapon attack with this weapon, you can expend a charge to have the weapon deal an additional [[/r 1d8]] kinetic damage.

Hewey is an N-30 battle blade owned by the mercenary Corso Riggs during the Galactic Cold War.

 

Vibroblade

Versatile ([[/r 1d10]])

A weapon with this property can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.
